nodes.text: This medical droid was on Alderaan at the time of the Clone Wars.

In around 21 BBY, Senator Padmé Amidala traveled to Alderaan to attend a meeting concerning the refugees displaced by the Clone Wars. However, bounty hunter Aurra Sing attempted to assassinate her while she was giving her speech. Although Jedi Ahsoka Tano prevented Aurra Sing from scoring a direct hit, she managed to shoot the Naboo senator in the arm, knocking her unconscious. This droid treated her and later informed the worried Ahsoka that the senator would be fine as it was only a flesh wound.
